content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on the walk way outside our inlaw's home while i was having a cigarette.  we were watching a satellite pass over the sky.  my son got my attention at the screen door and i spoke with him for a moment and then, turned around.  that is when i spotted the orange ball in the sky again.  it was nearly as large as a pencil end held at arm's length and was to the right (nw) this time.  again, it was above trees.  i pointed it out to my husband and we both moved out onto the lawn to watch it.  it was the same object that myself and my inlaws had seen just a couple weeks ago.  it was bright orange and seemed to strobe what looked more like blue and perhaps white this time.  we watched it for several minutes and both of us felt uneasy.  i looked over and could still spot venus in the sky, low on the horizon, so i am certain it was not venus, which is very bright and white. this very orange bright ball seemed to simply be hovering in the sky.  all the dogs in the neighborhood were going barking like mad.  my husband did not like it and said that maybe we should go inside, so we did.  we went inside for a couple minutes and my husband changed his mind and asked his parents to go outside and take a look at it.

we all went back outside and it was still there. about 15 minutes had passed at this point. it seemed to be a little further off and a little lower than when we had initially seen it.  we all stood in the front lawn near the porch watching it and could barely make out a plane that seemed to be flying in circles around it though it seemed very small and dim in comparison.  my father in law asked where his binoculars were so that he could get a better look but none of us knew.  we watched it as it slowly drifted to the right and descended into the treetops across the street.  the next door neighbors had started a fire next door so woodsmoke began to obscure things considerably. at this point, everyone went in except for myself and my father in law.  we watched it for a couple minutes more, talking to each other about how strange it was. it was still barely visible when we finally went back in ourselves.  

none of us have any idea what this thing is.  this is the second time that my inlaws and i have seen it, the first time for my husband.  it is really unnerving to all of us and we have no explanation for what we have seen.  the one thing that we all noticed this time was how the neighborhood dogs were behaving.  they were all very upset and remained so for even 2 hours later.
content.summary: Large bright strobing orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on the porch, having a cigarette.  the porch is west facing.  i had been sitting there for about a minute when i noticed that there was a bright light to the left of me, hovering just above the trees.  it struck as me as very peculiar because it was about the size of a pencil end at arm's length and it was a very bright orange.  it continued to hover there and i watched it, trying to figure out what it was.  it would flash a pale green color intermittently.  i had no clue what it was.  the only thing of that magnitude in that direction would've been venus and it wasn't venus.  

after about a couple minutes of watching it, i decided to put out my cigarette and go in to tell my parents in law, whom we are staying with, about the light in the sky.  they followed me outside and it had already dropped about half an inch in the sky and was skirting the tops of the trees.  we watched it for 15 minutes in kind of a morbid fascination as it seemed to move away from us and drop down further until it was partially obscured by trees.  when we could no longer see it clearly, we all went back into the house, unsettled.  none of us had any explanation for what we saw and were a little frightened.

there was more air traffic (military jets) that evening than the usual and they seemed to be flying very high over the orange flashing ball.  i thought perhaps that we had seen a large flare for some sort of practice but this did not make sense to me.  why would they drop it over the capital of the navajo nation? it also hovered in the sky for a long period of time and i am unsure that a flare could last as long as it did.  we never saw it blink out, even after 20 minutes of watching it.
content.summary: Large bright strobing orange ball

content.detailedDescription:

content.summary: Large bright strobing orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on pajarito mesa at los alamos national laboratory, when i saw three very large disks tilt 90 degrees and land into a hole that wasn't there just moments before. after they entered the enclosure, the hole disappeared. 
the disks were metalic with the colors of bright silver on top, the mid section was gray, and the lower section was black but with a metalic luster.
content.summary: Three very large disks landed into a huge whole in the ground.

content.detailedDescription: At around 12:30 or 1:00 am on october 19th i saw and pointed out to a friend what appeared to be a meteorite travelling through the upper atmosphere at extreme velocity.  i noticed a second object traveling near the first object, that soon went at a diffrent trajectory consistant still with a meteorite breaking up in the atmosphere.  the second object left sight while the first object continued a fast decent traveling due west.  the object quickly closed to around 20,000ft and was then apparent to be a delta wing style aircraft traveling silently at high speed. the aircraft had lights flashing in the rear that seemed to be red and blue.  the aircraft continued at around 20,000ft due west until i lost sight.  another aircraft that seemed to be the exact same traveled along roughly the same path came not 5 minutes later.  the second aircraft had a distinct bright white glow that lasted about a second.  my friend and i figure it was a military test aircraft.  i know alot about aircraft and physics and what this one did was astounding. i doubt any human could have withstood the g forces from the massive decent the object made, apparently from space.  while i can't understand why the military would fly stuff like that over a city, i believe it was a us aircraft of some sort and not intergalactic visitors. and from what i know about fighter jets and g forces, it would have had to be unmanned to pull off that decent manuever.
content.summary: Conteolled aircraft seemed to make a quick decent through the atmosphere to about 20,000 ft and flew over head.

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped, reading a map and waiting for a phone call for directions to a get together. looking up i saw one or perhaps two ufo's. it would move from one side of the sky to the other than seemingly vanish and appear instantly across the other side of the sky. i drew closer attention to the objects when i realized they didn't look like airplanes, and upon closer inspection, were not. although they appeared to move sideways, they must have been moving back or shrinking as their size and sometimes proportions would change. once they disappeared for about 15 minutes, i left and drove off. could someone please call me back, as i am curious if other saw these crafts.
content.summary: I saw one or perhaps two ufos over the hollywood hills

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped, reading a map and waiting for a phone call for directions to a get together. looking up i saw one or perhaps two ufo's. it would move from one side of the sky to the other than seemingly vanish and appear instantly across the other side of the sky. i drew closer attention to the objects when i realized they didn't look like airplanes, and upon closer inspection, were not. although they appeared to move sideways, they must have been moving back or shrinking as their size and sometimes proportions would change. once they disappeared for about 15 minutes, i left and drove off. could someone please call me back, as i am curious if other saw these crafts.
content.summary: I saw one or perhaps two ufos over the hollywood hills

content.detailedDescription:
A 54 yr old friend of mine who dosen't drink or use drugs
and lives about 5 miles from me keeps telling me about strange things he and his wife have seen in the sky over their residence.He says he's seen lights and triangle shaped objects hovering and then moving radically in many directions. where can i contact someone to investigate this ?    mikecad@peoplepc.Com
content.summary: Many sightings, various durations

content.detailedDescription: Sept. 10 or 11, 2005.  outside doing yard work, early-mid afternoon.  a neighbor came up to talk, while i was talking with her, i saw a small silvery object high in the ne spokane area sky (probably over nw idaho) that seemed to be flashing in the sunlight.  it looked extremely high in altitude, and like it was tumbling.  it reminded me of a fishing lure tumbling through the water, except this was larger and in the sky.  it was possibly square or rectangular, too far away to tell for sure.  i thought it might be a lost mylar balloon, but it stayed in the same spot for a very long time, and seemed too large.  i had other chores to finish, whe i returned 90 minutes or so later is was still in the same spot.  the next time i looked for it, maybe two hours after first seeing it, i was unable to find it again in the sky.
content.summary: Very high altitude, looked like a silver fishing lure tumbling and reflecting sunlight, stayed in one place for a long time.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving (five kids in van) and i was in the passenger seat on highway 59 in kansas.  headed west, we had just turned off k-33 hwy (douglas cnty) and sign said five miles to baldwin city.  there was a very large silvery shiny object in the sky ahead (west) above the tree line to the north (approx. 1 mile ahead of us in the sky).  i first thought of an airplane. as we continued west, you could still see the object and as we got closer the trees, which were to the north of the road, blocked our view.  after we passed the trees i looked to see if i could see the airplane and the object was gone.  i said  to my husband "did you see that shiny thing in the sky?" and he said he also saw the object.  one child in the seat behind me also said he had seen it.  it was there for many seconds (in front of us as we were heading west) and then as the trees blocked its view, it just disappeared.  there was nothing. i thought to myself if it was an airplane we would have surely been able to see it. if it was an airplane flying that low, it would have still been visible.  that night driving home around 8:00 p.M.  around the same vicinity, there were several lights that were not airplane lights.  one stayed in the same spot in the horizon as we headed south on k-33 (towards k-68).  if it was an airplane, it did not have any blinking lights and it did not seem to go anywhere.
content.summary: Very large shiny silvery object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down randall toward east st. when i saw what appeared to be a airplane ahead of me in the sky. i kept my eye on it as i approached east st. i realized that something didn't seam right, and that it was not moving. as i was driving down the road it looked like a straight row of lights with two blinking lights on each end in the sky. i stopped my car and rolled my window down and starred directly up at this "thing." at that moment i realized that it was not an airplane, and that it had the shape of a triangle with a big white light at each angle of the triangle. there was no sound coming from it either. if i had to guess, i would say that it was about two football fields high, and about the size of a small airplane. i sat there about 30 seconds, when it took off in the direction of ravenna and i could still see it, but the lights were gone, and there were two blinking lights on each end that were visible. i pulled into the parking lot were i had to drop off my kids, and continued to watch it at a distance, only seeing the two blinking lights. i went in to the building to drop off my kids, and when i came out it was gone.
i know that there has to be others that witnessed this, due to the time is occured, and that i was stopped in the middle of the road , and there were cars behind me.
content.summary: Appeared in same position in sky, triangle shaped, w/lights at each angle of the triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Hunting

i

it landed about 550 yrs from me
i new it was something i never saw before in this world
at frist when i saw it it looked like the sky but when it got close it was shine and refleted the sky that who ever was in would see me.I was worryed.I got in a place where i felt safe and watched this thing for a hr 28 min, at that point it took off to the south not making a sound and whet over some mnt and that is the last i saw of it it has bbeen on my mind ever since.
content.summary: Saw a disk land in a meadow

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were giving my brother and his wife a grand tour of our newly completed astronomical observatory on the evening of friday sept. 30, 2005. it was a crystal clear, steady night (referring to the air currents) and the sky was perfect for viewing, as they usually are at 7000 ft. altitudes. the moon and mars had not risen yet and venus, jupiter and saturn had already set so the night was also quite dark.

i teach amateur astronomy and i always start with basic sky navigation using binoculars and small aperture refractor scopes before opening the observatory and the large telescope. i use a 5mw green laser pointer quite extensively for guiding to and pointing out objects that are visible with small optics. it���s very bright and easily seen up to 20 miles, and although air traffic is quiet in this part of arizona i���m still very careful where i point it.
we had been observing for about an hour when my wife asked me what this object was on the eastern horizon just above tree top level that was radically changing in brightness. i took my laser pointer and pointed toward it, but not at it, to confirm it was the star mira pulsating due to the thick horizon air and went on with our viewing.

about 40 seconds later the four of us were quite startled and speechless when a very bright (brilliant white), round object about the size of a nickel at arms length, suddenly appeared above us in the nnw. i immediately took a time and position check and had my brother confirm it at 8:16 pm, az 350��� 41.21���, alt 22��� 49.612���, or about equal distances between the stars dubhe and polaris.

i had the binoculars around my neck and focused for my eyes so i had time to take a look, and it appeared more spherical in shape. it made no sound and cast no shadows for as bright and large as it was. our wives were yelling, ���what is that thing and where did it come from���!  all of us had the feeling "we" we're being observed. after about 30 seconds or so it receded away from us to the nnw and below the horizon in a second or less. i say ���receded��� because it didn���t just fade out and disappear from a stationary spot in the sky, it sped away from us at an incredible speed and disappeared down below the horizon. none of us have any idea what it was, but we're very sure of what it wasn't.

i���m 56 years old and been an amateur astronomer all my life and have never been treated to such a stunning sight as this. we have cross-examined this incident from every angle and have concluded that it had to have been the green laser activity that caused this sighting. take it from there!

sincerely,
ron firestone
content.summary: Very large, very bright, no sound, spherical object over us ( at 30 degrees above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Description from witness (from e-mail):  last week, on either thursday or friday, september 22 or 23,2005, i was traveling south on the 605 freeway. i had just passed the intersection of the 605 and the 60 freeway, near el monte, ca.  the time was around 6:30 pm, and the sub had just gone down.  there was still adequate daylight in the sky, when i noticed a long line of white smoke in the sky.  a flying object was leaving this white smoke trail, doing several loops in the sky.  i could not see the type of flying object, but the white smoke trail was coming from the west and the object was travelling quickly towards the east.  thge object was not directly above me, but maybe 40-50 miles to the southwest.  the end of the smoke trail was dissipating and colored orange/red by the sun that had just set in the west.  i watched it for about 5 minutes as i travelled south on the 605, and i noticed that other drivers were also gazing upwards and perplexed.  suddenly, the flying object stopped emitting the strong white smoke trail, but i could still see by its shadow that it was moving eastward.  in an instant, it turned 90 degrees and seemed to jet in a southernly direction.  the object moved quickly and was at a very high altitude from what i would estimate.  i initially thought it was some air force plane dumping gas, or maybe the combination of the setting sun's light on the high altitude plane's emissions, but the 90 degree turn threw me off.
content.summary: Flying object with white smoke trail makes 90 degree turn.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching this object for around 10 years.
   my friends also, most of the time it is west of my house. tonight it was south, real close when i noticed
 it. then i put cam corder on it for about 20 min.
        i also have others of it.
   sometimes it stays stationary other times moves closer 
 then farther away other timems right & left very fast.
   its all on tape.Some times i will see it make note where
  it is in the sky, go in the house come back out and it will have moved way up to left of sky go back in the house
and it will be closer and way down to the right.I usuly see it 2 or 3 times a mounth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Red white blue lights , round object  pulsaits every few min.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw these ufos twice.  i do not claim they are extraterrestrial in origin, but i've never seen anything like them before.

first time was when changing out some ram in a server at work.  as i walked out of the data center in our kearny mesa complex, i saw what appeared to be a "dancing" street light, sodium yellow, leaving strange trails in the sky, close to the horizon.  it eminated no sound at all, but was quite distant.  the light source was highly specular -- like very bright pinpricks of sodium-yellow light.  behind them were trails of sparks.  it was weaving very slowly back and forth, slowly descending until it disappeared behind the trees, where i could see the light source extinguished.  my initial reaction was that this was some kind of night-time gimmick of the air shows that miramar marine base was putting on at the time.  however, as my house is used as the turn-around point for nearly all the aircraft that seems to fly in these shows, i must note that no aircraft was flying over my home at the time, and these objects made no sound at all.  therefore, it is strongly unlikely to be airshow related, at least using military jets.

then, as i was driving home, having just merged off the clairmont mesa onramp, south-bound on the 163, heading towards 52 west, i noticed a *pair* of these things gliding through the sky.  one was flying a straight line, while the other was undulating sinusoidally around it.  both were leaving spark trails, that often seemed to drop reasonably close to the ground.  they appeared to be flying in a westerly direction, almost heading in the same direction as my home, and did not appear to be over miramar base at the time.  when arriving home, i didn't see anything, and didn't hear anything either.
content.summary: "sparklers" undulating/dancing through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was playing tennis with a friend, and my friend went to the restroom and i laid down on the court to rest. with my hands behind my head, in my peripheral vision, i noticed movement, which i thought were birds flying pretty high in a group. when i focused, i noticed that it was 3 spheres in a triangle formation. i did notice light from the spheres, but i am not sure if the light was generated at the source, or if it was reflected from the sun. a faint, but discernable line did connect the 3 spheres, but the inside of the triangle appeared blue like the surrounding sky. the object was traveling in a straight line, while slowly rotating counterclockwise. the object was traveling at a high speed, silently, and if i had to guess at the altitude, comparing it to a jetliner which travels at around 30,000 ft, i would say this object was 15-20,000 ft. i only saw it long enought for it to rotate about a quarter of a turn (2 to 3 seconds) before it disappeared from sight in the blink of an eye. i know about aircraft, and i understand their dynamics, i felt a surprised and taken aback by what i saw.
content.summary: 3 slowly rotating spheres in triangle formation rotating counterclockwise traveling in straight line at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to smoke a cigarette. i was looking into the sky toward the east looking at what i believe was saturn. i looked to the north and from nowhere appeared what i first thought was a very large bird flying at about 500 feet above the ground. the track it took was due south. the thing that first made me realize it was not a bird or plane was there was no lights and no movement of the wings. i stood up and followed the craft until it vanished. there was no sound. the sky seemed to shimmer like the way heat radiation makes light move in daylight. i got goose bumps, the hair on the back of my neck stood up. i came inside and told my girlfriend. i am 48 years old. i am a lieutenant on the fire department here where been working for 19 years. i have seen many things in the last 6-7 weeks but nothing like this. i can't speak to anyone i work with about this because they will say it is stress related due to the work we've been doing here since the storm. i know what i saw was real!
content.summary: I looked up saw an object appear , fly due south and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine showed me some footage that he was able to capture on digital video while working in his back yard.  he did not know what to do with it until he brought to my attention about a year later.  he said it was bright as a little star in broad daylight which caught his attention and because it remained for so long he went in the house and grabbed his video camera.   he has a very clean capture for more than a few second (hard to find through view finder / sun) but the image when centered and zoomed in is fairly focused is unmistakeable (non conventional aircraft).   we are going to make copies before talking to anyone and need to know who to consult with.  i have personally deamed the recording authentic and consider this a major find (daytime - 2004 - so cal). i plan to interview him myself as well.  as compared to historial grainy photos or video, this is an eye opener).  this is not a goodyear blimp, auto dealer ballon, or a toy of some sort. we will be ready to present in the near future.
content.summary: Super bright at first, silent, somewhat stationary, round with median and small dome

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my flat minding my own business during a lightening storm.

2. its slow movement.

3. an ufo.

4. small coned and bright silver, wobbling as it passed through a circula gap in the clouds.

5. stood stairing as i followed it with my eyes.

6. as it went towards the outskirts.
content.summary: Silver cone

content.detailedDescription:
Account of events - 
it was a normal friday night i was outside with two friends at about 7:45pm we were talking to one another. i saw a big orange light in the distance i said look at that star i thought it was a star at the time. my friends looked they said they had never seen a star that big before. we continued with our conversation it was now 20:00pm. but then the star started to change rapidly it was moving towards us. i stared at it and pointed to it, my friends looked and they were just amazed we started to say stuff to one another such as what the hell is that. it was amazing. it came over the house it was behind and we could just see this big black triangle with three orange lights and one big one in the middle. at this point i new it was nothing like a helicopter or anything normal for that matter. i went inside as fast as possible i got the digital camera i alerted my parents i said - come and look at this thing outside. they thought i was fooling around so they did not come. i went back out and by the time this had happened it started to disappear out of sight. i took a picture but it disappeared as soon as i took it. later when analyzing the picture there was no sign of the ufo or anything on the picture. my parents had seen i had left the door open and heard me talking to my friends saying what the hex was that thing and other similar comments. they came out and asked what was going on i said what had happened and they could not believe it 

thats the report that i have built up from my friends account of events and my account of events. 

for any questions go to my site
www.Alienationsam.Tk

i have enclosed a reconstruction that i did of the event it is 37mb so i am not sure if it will be accepted.
content.summary: Large triangle ufo came over us.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of tuesday september 20, 2005, my fianc���e and i were sitting out on the deck by the pool, just chatting after a hard days work. at around 6:30 pm or so, i looked up at the sky (something very bright caught my attention from the corner of my eye). as i looked up i saw this huge bright round fireball (not really a fireball, but instead a huge bright round ball). i called out to my fianc���e. we both thought it was a meteor but quickly changed our minds as this object was completely round and close enough to where we were (as if you tried covering a full moon with a hand right after sunset), and this bright, huge ball traveled west to east at an incredible speed. it was of an intense blue with pinkish hues of color when we first saw it. it trailed what i would describe as a fire tail. it made absolutely no sound though it was low enough we though it would crash. my heart was pounding and fear overwhelmed me. what really caught our attention was the intensity of its brilliance, of its colors. i have never seen such beautiful colors. though it was still daylight its brilliance was greater than the daylight itself. we watched in amazement as it started to plummet downwards. it slowed down and changed colors just before it vanished.  from blue it turned a brilliant orange/red. at this point my fianc���e and i thought it was going to explode and we better leave. that did not happen. instead, all of a sudden it simply disappeared in front of our eyes. it did not fall nor did it fly away, nor exploded. it just simply disappeared in a yet brighter color than it previously had. all that was left behind was a small, thin trail of smoke.  it was definitely not a meteor or shooting star (too close to be that and besides, it was intact). it has been by far the scariest experience i've had in my life. i am now aware that other people in florida witnessed a fireball on the evening of september 20, 2005 over the florida's skies and at other dates as well. my fianc���e and i are still in shock.  what was it? is anyone investigating that?  it has been by far the scariest experience i've had in my life. the colors, its intensity and the act of disappearance have forever changed my views on ufo's, and am fearful to observe the sky. i was not a believer.
content.summary: Huge bright  fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Temperature - about 5 - 10 degrees 

shape - triangle 

direction - west 

speed - about 10 - 20 mph 

how many ufo's - one ufo 
short description - triangle with three orange lights and one big orange light in the center of the craft 

account of events - 
it was a normal friday night i was outside with two friends at about 7:45pm we were talking to one another. i saw a big orange light in the distance i said look at that star i thought it was a star at the time. my friends looked they said they had never seen a star that big before. we continued with our conversation it was now 20:00pm. but then the star started to change rapidly it was moving towards us. i stared at it and pointed to it, my friends looked and they were just amazed we started to say stuff to one another such as what the hell is that. it was amazing. it came over the house it was behind and we could just see this big black triangle with three orange lights and one big one in the middle. at this point i new it was nothing like a helicopter or anything normal for that matter. i went inside as fast as possible i got the digital camera i alerted my parents i said - come and look at this thing outside. they thought i was fooling around so they did not come. i went back out and by the time this had happened it started to disappear out of sight. i took a picture but it disappeared as soon as i took it. later when analyzing the picture there was no sign of the ufo or anything on the picture. my parents had seen i had left the door open and heard me talking to my friends saying what the hex was that thing and other similar comments. they came out and asked what was going on i said what had happened and they could not believe it 

thats the report that i have built up from my friends account of events and my account of events. 

if you have any questions contact me at my site www.Alienationsam.Tk
content.summary: The ufo at first looked like a massive orange star then it came over us and it was a triagular craft.

content.detailedDescription: Was having a fitful night of sleep when awakened by a very loud rumbling/roaring sound. the sound was a great distance away and advancing very slowly. after listening for a while and realizing "something wasn't quite right" about the sound, (it was taking too long of a time to finally arrive in my area and was making vibrating feeling occur), i got up and went all the way across the house to the back door deck area where best view of the sky would be. just in time to see a very intense, brite light, the size of a dime held at arms length pass over the tall trees in our woods. was more oval in shape tho. woods animals reacted strongly with various screeching, howls, and such. some dogs barking nearby. the craft took a northeasterly heading. the sound was the most disturbing part of the sighting...Could hear it for a long time as it advanced and then left the area...Almost a full minute in all. seemed to be moving too slow for the size of it. very loud. feeling unsettled and unnerved after this incident. have had other sightings in the past also. have been in contact with mufon before. thanx.
content.summary: Loud, noisy craft, oval, red-orange color, like a dime at arms length.

content.detailedDescription: Me  and  my  brother  and sister in law  lived  in  colchester, about  1971. we  lived  in  a  caravan,  one late summers  evening  the night  sky  was clear, when  i went  out side,for some  reason  i looked  up  then  i  saw  a  large black oval shape  ring  just  going  over my  head,to  me  it  was  about 60  feet  in the sky,  and  it flew  from  one end  of  the  horizon  to  the  other,it  looked  like  about 30 feet  across  ,  it  made no  sound,  showed  no  lights,but with the clear  night  sky it was  very  easy  to see,i  called  my  brother he  saw  it  too.It  passed  from  one  end  of the  horizon  to  the  other  in  a matter   of  seconds.Never  did  report  it because  people  think  your  a  nutter.
content.summary: Large  dark  ring

content.detailedDescription: It was summer around 1972 or 1973 and my father who was an ex-nasa employee from the late 1960���s (satellite designer) called the whole family outside to see something. my father, mom, brother, sister and myself all went outside. hovering above the golf course west of our house was a huge disk shaped object. it was actually shaped like a car tire with no center hole. since it was dusk what we were watching was actually the silhouette outlined in the brighter evening sky, rather than seeing the clear surface of the object. as we watched it became apparent there were port holes all around it every 4-5 feet or so. it seemed like every other one was red or yellowish-white. the object was about 60 feet in diameter and rotating slowly as it slowly came toward our back yard. its height was no more than 120-140 feet off the ground (perhaps as low as 100 feet). i remember thinking i could hit it with a rock. it did not wobble on it's axis as a balloon might but was perfectly controlled. it moved very slowly (perhaps 5 mph) and came right up to the sw corner of our yard where it paused (about 60 feet away) before it slowly started reversing direction to head back across the golf course toward green acres terrace across the golf course. when it got over to the circle on green acres terrace it reversed again and came back toward us but only came back until it was about 100 yards away this time. when it reversed this time it went farther away and then came back toward us again but did not get as close as the previous time. i asked my father, "dad, what is that?" he said, "i don't know." i knew what it was; a ufo. i told my brother to go inside and get my polaroid camera. he said, "you go get it!" the object seemed to be almost swinging back and forth as it moved in a kind of searching pattern back and forth across the golf course moving further away with each pass until it was gone within 15-20 minutes. it was rotating slowly the whole time.
content.summary: Slowly rotating disk-like object

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the beach across from the malibu fish place on pch around 8:30pm waiting for a mufon researcher (alex) and he never showed (got lost) and meanwhile i went across to the beach and looked up and the attached photos are what i saw..Don't know if it's a plane or ufo but it was going incredibly fast and disappeared then reappeared ..Then was gone ..I had time to open my car door very quickly grab my camera and shoot..
it was like doing curly-qu designs ...It went across the sky from left to right then stopped and disappeared then reappeared a distance away..More curly qus..I thought it was so cool and beautiful..But that it was just a normal plane except i never knew one that could do this
content.summary: Design in the sky, disapeared then reappeared and small designs then it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was at home last night. i went outside to my backyard to have a cigg. as i was exiting through the sliding glass door, i noticed a light in the sky. this, of course, is not an uncommon sight. there is a municipal airport in my city and 3 international airports within 30 miles of here in wich this area is the major traffic coridor for. so my first thought always is airplane. anyway, before i opened the door, i thought i saw the light move very erratically, from left to right. i kept watching as i stepped outside. thinking the movement might be an illusion because of my movement i stopped and watched it. it was definately moving left to right and right to left with intermediate pauses. i have seen these many times since february of this year. but this one moved the most extreme to date. usually they just tack across the sky, very gradually, like a boat would on the sea. the best way to describe this object, is just a simple point of white, blue, or red light. this one was white. it reminds me of when i was a teen and i'd be outside at night and you'ed see a satillite cross the sky. but if you've ever seen one, you know they travel a very predictable path. a very clean arc across the sky. these look like that, except the movement. and to date, they never moved this obviousely. usually only in small increments. it was going from west to east till it went out of sight. my reaction was that was the best personal evidence i've seen with my own eye's that i didn't see a satillite. i then sent a "fast blast" to coast-to-coast am w/george noorey. i then found web site i could report it to and did. i kept watching it till the house next door blocked my view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light in sky, high in stratosphere or space, moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked into my livingroom, raised shades to my view of the mountains, sat down to watch tv, saw a light out of the corner of my eye, looked to see this fiery canister.  never saw anything like it before!  it was high over approaching dark, rain clouds coming from the west over the mountains but eventually disappeared behind them.

i first chose not to report it and then decided maybe someone else saw it so made a report september 12.  i was ok with the sighting, thinking i'm now one of them who has seen an ufo.
content.summary: Canister, white firey, size of a penny, moving from south to west at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out window facing north early am because everynight i wake up at the same time even if i have just gone to bed. i take this to mean to me to do yoga, meditate, or look out of the window. first noticed because planet is brighter than any other. earlier in the eve you can see it farther away. it moves closer just like the planets do.  this night shown like it was lighted by a bright white light not yellowish like planets reflecting the sun.  upon closer look with binocculars it would flash red, blue, white light clearly. it travels across the sky just as a planet does, not noticable only in perspective with the other planets. i thought it may be a satalite or something like taht. but every night i would look at it. on this night looking at it through the binocculars i thought i saw a gascious arrow like narrow beam coming at an angle away from the planet going more west towards earth. i put the binocs down and said did i see that? picked them up again and yes it was there and moving steadly in sort of a go pause pattern like the second hand on a clock. tears come to my eyes, fear and excitement but still what the hell is it. i called another person in the house to come see it. they were mad because i woke them. he came looked and said "yes i see something, but i can't do anything about it." then went back to bed. after that i tried to look at it again but i could not easily find it to look and when i did it seemed to bounce up and down back and forth so i couldn't focus. decided to go to bed. 
it is up there every night. it's position has changed just like the planets so it goes off in another angled direction as the nights passes. sorry no photos.
content.summary: Seen over the week. a bright light as star,  flashing blue/red light with streams coming down towards earth.
